articles.title: Plant-based diet rich in soy reduces troubling menopause symptoms by 84% - News-Medical.Net
articles.description: A new study, published by the North American Menopause Society in the journal Menopause, found a plant-based diet rich in soy reduces moderate-to-severe hot flashes by 84%, from nearly five per day to fewer than one per day.
